Welcome back. ^____^

Yah, anything related to earth religions, that isn't IC (an nothing 
religious should be metioned when talking about BW anyway) shouldn't 
be said. I don't want to start a fight about religion or anything... 
those are the most stupid things ever, so no more comments about 
religion please. =)

> I know I shouldn't evangilize on the net, but I'll

> to use the lords name in vain, and yes that includes
> "thank God".
